articles.title: Taguig inoculates OFWs, seniors with Moderna vaccines - GMA News Online
articles.description: The Taguig government on Thursday announced it will inoculate senior citizens and overseas Filipino workers during the first rollout of American-made Moderna vaccines.
articles.content:

articles.title: Indian-American Abhimanyu Mishra becomes youngest Grandmaster in chess history - Yahoo India News
articles.description: The 12-year old Indian-American broke Sergey Karjakin's record that has stood for 19 years.
articles.content:
Abhimanyu Mishra is now the youngest Grandmaster in history. (Pic courtesy: Twitter)

articles.title: Delta variant `greatest threat` to US` COVID efforts: Dr Anthony Fauci - Zee News
articles.description: The highly contagious Delta variant of the coronavirus is the  greatest threat  to America s attempt to eradicate the Covid pandemic, the country s leading infectious disease expert and White House Chief Medical Advisor Dr Anthony Fauci has warned.
